jobDescription: Position: Data Analyst: III (Senior)- Data EngineerContract:6+MonthsLocation: Battle Creek, MI This position will be a maximum of 12 months. Performs data collection, analysis, validation and reporting. Designs, tests, and documents processes, SQL queries, and stored procedures. Extracts and analyzes data from various sources, including databases, manual files, and external websites. Responds to data inquiries from various groups within an organization. Creates and publishes regularly scheduled and ad hoc reports. Documents reporting requirements and processes and validates data components as required. Requires experience with relational databases and knowledge of query tools and/or statistical software. Strong analytical and organizational skills also essential. • In depth knowledge of SQL, Hadoop, data warehousing and ETL tools • SAS for ETL is a plus • Basic Tableau is a plus • SAP BODS experience • Functional knowledge: experience with “Deductions” or case management (or related field) Years Exp: 5 - 10. Experience: Relies on extensive experience to plan and accomplish tasks . Leadership/Contributions: Leads and directs the work of others.. Reports to: Director. Advanced Degree or Certifications? Yes.- provided by Dice  SQL, Hadoop, data warehousing and ETL
